page.title: 02POPULATION,NW NEWBURY,SPEEN
page.content: {AREA OF GREATEST DENSITY}is in south & southeast of area,mainly in 2 housing estates,at {SHAW}&{SPEEN. {NORTH OF AREA}houses generally have more land and are set in farming area,therefore population is sparser. {PROVISIONS FOR OLD AGE}1{CENTRES OF {SHELTERED ACCOMMODATION}funded by Newbury District Council with resident Warden at Shaw & Speen.Remote control warning system recently inaugurated by{Queen Mother.2.DONNINGTON HOSPITAL} ,founded 1393,for men, &{ {ABBERBURY CLOSE},founded this century, for women,are {ALMSHOUSES.}3.{ {DONNINGTON PRIORY}now owned by firm of Auctioneers,once occupied by laymen.
